text: The values come from quite large forms from which I don't want to predefine every variabele in HS

So I tried to add a text field to Contact and fill this field with our JSON structure. I then tried to parse the JSON using HuBL in our mail, but since the replacements are executed in seperate processes I am unable to use the contact-field in HuBL filters like `parsejson`
I was unable to find a solution for my question, I hope you understand my use case and maybe have some pointers to solutions?
